article_title: A Study On The Wealth Effect And The Economy

article_metadata.author: Investopedia

og.description: By Elvis Picardo The “wealth effect” refers to the premise that consumers tend to spend more when there is a bull market in widely-held assets like real estate or stocks, because rising asset prices make them feel wealthy. The notion that the wealth effect spurs personal consumption makes sense intuitively. After [...]
